CARGURU is a car sharing service. The price for use includes absolutely all costs, including fuel, parking charge and insurance. All operations, including registration, opening and closing of the car are made via our mobile application.

What makes CARGURU different from a usual car rental
Firs of all, absolutely all costs associated with the use of the car are already included in the tariff. The customer pays only for the time when he used the car. there are no hidden costs, deposits and over-payments!
Secondly, all operations, including registration, opening and closing of the car are made via our mobile application. The user does not have to go to the company’s office to sign a contract, take the car keys and return them later at an agreed place. Our clients can take the vehicle exactly in the time when they actually need to and use it as long as they want to, and leave it wherever it is convenient for them.
And finally, our clients can rent a car for a short period of time — even for 5 minutes! After all, if a client needs a car only for a short period, then why would he overpay for the time when he is not using it?
Eventually, CARGURU is something more than just car rental. This is a fundamentally new perspective on mobility and an alternative to private transport.

•Watch aircraft move around the world in real-time

Flightradar24 is a free app and includes all the above features. If you want even more great features from Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker there are two upgrade options—Silver & Gold—and each comes with a free trial.
 
Silver
•90 days of flight history
•More aircraft details, like serial number & age
•More flight details, like vertical speed & squawk
•Filters and alerts to find and track the flights you’re interested in

Gold 
•All the features included in Flightradar24 Silver +

•Detailed live map weather layers for clouds & precipitation
•Aeronautical charts & oceanic tracks showing the pathways flights follow across the sky

If you choose to upgrade to a Silver or Gold subscription, a payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the end of the free trial period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your account settings in the iTunes Store. Silver and Gold upgrade prices are listed in the app as they vary depending on your country and currency. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

HOW IT WORKS
Most aircraft today are equipped with ADS-B transponders that transmit positional data. Flightradar24 has a rapidly growing network of 20,000 ground stations to receive this data that then shows up as aircraft moving on a map in the app. In an expanding number of regions, with the help of multilateration, we’re able to calculate the positions of aircraft that don’t have ADS-B transponders. Coverage is subject to change at any time.

The fine print: a HIDDEN-CITY flight is a flight where you get off at the layover rather than the final destination. For example, a flight from New York to San Francisco might be $300, but a similar flight from New York to Seattle with a layover in San Francisco might be $200. If you’re going to San Francisco we’ll show you both flights, and if you choose the cheaper one, you get off the plane at the layover (San Francisco) rather than going to the final destination (Seattle).

This is perfectly legal and the savings can be significant, but if you’ve never traveled like this before, you should read our HIDDEN-CITY FAQ at http://skiplagged.com/faq

We’ll always show you all the options, so YOU can pick the deal you want!

WeGoTrip is the travel app to book self-guided audio tours and skip-the-line / fast-track tickets to museums, galleries, and many other attractions. You get ASAP tickets and personal audio tour guide right after the booking.

What is a self guided tour?
WeGoTrip self guided tour is better than regular audio guide. This is an audio tour with offline maps and clear navigation, filled with interesting stories from local citizens about popular attractions and supplemented with augmented reality riddles.

You don’t depend on a guide or a group tour
You can book a tour or activity ticket at the last minute, availability is checked online. Moreover, you control the tour: you can start and pause the tour at any time should you want to wander off the guided path and explore city or museum on your own. Each audio tour has built-in maps, so there's no chance for you to get lost of the route.

Self-guided audio tour in your language
You get a self-guided tour in your native language. All audio tours are recorded by professional guides and work offline. Route download is the only one thing you have to do at the start.

Find things to do on your city trip
— Sightseeing tours: Walking Tours, Bike Tours, City tours, Skip The Line Tours.
— Cultural & History Tours: Art & Museums, History & Heritage, Architecture, Archeology.
— Theme tours: Quest Tours, Family Friendly Tours, Food & Wine Tours
— Sightseeing Tickets & Passes, Attraction Tickets, Museum Tickets & Passes, Skip The Line Tickets

There are all popular international travel destinations presented
Europe: Rome, Florence, Madrid, Venice, Amsterdam, Paris, Prague, London, Barcelona, Berlin, Budapest, Edinburgh, Oxford, Lisbon, Pompeii, Saint Petersburg, Moscow, etc.
North America: New York City, Chicago, New Orleans, Las Vegas, Montreal, etc.
Asia: Dubai, Tel Aviv, Istanbul, etc.

Top Venues include:
Eiffel Tower, Colosseum, Palace of Versailles, British Museum, Churchill Museum, Louvre Museum, Sagrada Familia, Catacombs of Paris, 9/11 Memorial Museum, Arc de Triomphe, Burj Khalifa, Fondation Louis Vuitton, Montjuic Cable Car, Musee d'Orsay, Rijksmuseum, Sainte Chapelle, Prado Museum and much more.

Turn your phone into a private tour guide and discover new interesting places. Download WeGoTrip travel app and pass interactive self-guided tours in cities & museums all around the world!

The official app of the Long Island Rail Road and Metro-North Railroad brings TrainTime to MTA eTix. You can now plan railroad trips and buy tickets all in one place without having to switch between apps. 

Whether you’re new to the system or a daily commuter, make your trips as seamless as possible with:
• In-App Tickets: Our biggest request! Securely buy and use Long Island Rail Road and Metro-North Railroad (East of Hudson only) tickets in the same app you use to plan your trip
• Trip Planning: Check schedules, view track assignments, and see how full trains usually are
• Realtime Train Tracking: See exactly where each train in your trip is, check when it will arrive, and follow it throughout your trip
• Realtime Seat Availability: See the list of cars on your train and how full each one is for the best chance of snagging a seat
• Alerts: Service alerts straight from the source, presented in the context of your trip
• Chat: Text with customer service without leaving the app
• Station Information: Check upcoming departures, elevator and escalator status, and ticket office hours
• Trip Sharing: Send your trip details to friends and family
• Saved Trips: Save all your favorite trips/trains for quick and easy access
• Long Press Shortcut: Long press on the app icon for a shortcut to show your tickets right away

summary.label:
GPS путеводитель и аудиогид Travelry работает без интернета и умеет превращать поездки в увлекательные путешествия. Бесплатная оффлайн карта для легкой навигации по городу, проверенные маршруты и увлекательные аудиоэкскурсии, удобный поиск достопримечательностей, разговорник с аудио, лайфхаки для путешественников и море полезной информации.	

• ГУЛЯЙТЕ С УДОВОЛЬСТВИЕМ И НЕ БОЙТЕСЬ ЗАБЛУДИТЬСЯ
С Travelry Вы не заблудитесь в незнакомом городе. Бесплатный гид и путеводитель покажет ваше местоположение на оффлайн карте и подскажет, как далеко от вас находятся достопримечательности и что интересного поблизости. И для этого не потребуется доступ к интернету! Только разрешение определять Вашу геопозицию. 

• ПРОДУМАННЫЕ МАРШРУТЫ И УВЛЕКАТЕЛЬНЫЙ АУДИОГИД 
Выбирайте любой из предложенных в путеводителе маршрутов, скачивайте соответствующую экскурсию и гуляйте, слушая увлекательные рассказы аудиогида. С ним вы узнаете множество любопытных фактов и удивительных историй. Стамбул, Рим, Париж, Прага, Будапешт, Вена, Амстердам, Венеция, Барселона, Москва готовы поделиться с вами своими самыми впечатляющими секретами!

• УДОБНЫЙ ПОИСК ДОСТОПРИМЕЧАТЕЛЬНОСТЕЙ
Мы отобрали для Вас самые интересные места с полезной информацией и распределили их по категориям, чтобы Вы могли найти именно то, что Вас интересует. Используйте поиск по названию места или фильтр «Поблизости», чтобы легко найти достопримечательности на карте или в каталоге. Узнавайте места по фото, отслеживайте расстояние до них. Добавляйте места в «Избранное», чтобы спланировать путешествие и выделить из обилия достопримечательностей именно те, которые приглянулись Вам.

• ЛЮБИТЕ ИМПРОВИЗИРОВАТЬ?
Если Вы не хотите следовать предложенному маршруту, то можете идти по своему или просто бродить по городу. Для этого предварительно скачайте экскурсии с аудиорассказами. А затем откройте в приложении карту и вооружитесь наушниками. Просто гуляйте по городу, а Travelry расскажет об интересных местах рядом с Вами! Так Вы не пройдете мимо интересных мест и узнаете, какие секреты таят в себе те красивые здания, площади, переулки, рядом с которыми Вы проходите. Вас ждут только самые интересные рассказы, отборные маршруты, проверенные советы и яркие впечатления! 

• ОБЩАЙТЕСЬ И НАХОДИТЕ ДРУЗЕЙ
Бесплатный аудио разговорник, доступный в путеводителе по Риму, Парижу, Венеции и Праге, поможет найти общий язык с местными жителями и чувствовать себя в городе более уверенно.

• И ВСЕ ЭТО - БЕСПЛАТНО ИЛИ СОВСЕМ НЕДОРОГО!
Оффлайн карты с GPS-навигацией, разговорник, каталог достопримечательностей с фотографиями и некоторые экскурсии абсолютно бесплатны. Если же вы захотите прослушать другие аудиоэкскурсии, вы можете приобрести их с помощью встроенных покупок. 

В настоящее время в приложении доступны путеводитель и аудиогид по Стамбулу, Риму, Парижу, Будапешту, Барселоне, Праге, Вене, Венеции, Амстердаму и Москве. На подходе новые города.

СОВЕТ
Продолжительное использование GPS в фоновом режиме разряжает аккумулятор и может существенно уменьшить время его работы. Поэтому рекомендуем использовать приложение на заряженном устройстве или брать с собой портативное зарядное устройство. 

Для полноценной работы функции автоматического GPS аудиогида приложению необходим доступ к вашему местоположению (в том числе в фоновом режиме), а вам - заряженный телефон, наушники, удобная обувь для прогулок и готовность к интересным рассказам! 

СЧАСТЛИВЫХ ПУТЕШЕСТВИЙ!

The app for travelling by tram, (night) bus, metro and ferry in Amsterdam and the rest of the Netherlands. Your indispensable travel buddy for frequent travellers or for just a visit. Quickly and easily plan your trip from home to work, a restaurant or the theatre or from Schiphol to your hotel or B&B. Check whether there is a diversion or delay on your route. You always have your favourite line’s up-to-date departure times at your fingertips. And now it’s also possible to purchase a barcode ticket for immediate travel. 

What the GVB travel app offers you:
- Up-to-date travel information: always the most reliable and up-to-date travel information for the GVB network as well as for all other public transport companies in the Netherlands. 
- Trip planner: plan your trip to any address in Amsterdam or the rest of the Netherlands.
- Alert for disruptions: turn notifications on for your favourite line(s). You will receive an Alert if there’s a diversion or disruption. You can set this for certain days and time periods. 
- Crowd indicator: in each requested travel advice, you can immediately see how busy a service is expected to be. 
- Bicycle as before and after transport: under travel preferences, you can easily indicate whether you will start or end your trip by bicycle. 
- Travel only with GVB: if you have a GVB travel product, e.g. a GVB hour/day or GVB Flex, and only want to travel with GVB lines, it’s easy to set this in your travel preferences. 
- Save favourites: save your favourite locations in Amsterdam with just one click. It’ll then be even easier to plan your next trip. 
- In-app ticket purchase: you can buy tickets via the app for one hour or for more hours/days and activate them immediately so you are ready to travel. Easily check in and out using your mobile. 

Why are travellers using the GVB app even more?  
- Unique Touch Swipe planner – The most personalised trip planner in the Netherlands. Simply swipe from your current, favourite or any other set location to the key places of interest in the city and your trip will be planned instantly. Then you can personalise your destinations. Select your destinations from a list of main locations in Amsterdam and surroundings, and save them for later use.
- Personal dashboard based on your travel profile. Directly access the key functions for your travel profile via your main screen. For example, if you use the app mainly for commuting, you will find your set regular route in your dashboard. In that way you always have the up-to-date departure times at hand.
- You can compose your own menu to display the functions which are most useful to you.
- Check the latest updates on disruptions and planned diversions.
- Search for up-to-date departure times by location, stop name or line. (available from mid-May 2021)
- Get in touch with GVB Customer Service quickly and have direct access to GVB Services such as lost & found or missed check-out (claim a refund for missed check-ins or check-outs). 
- Fully available in Dutch and English.
